column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/fb0507fe4b3ff733386c8e3580032cfc965eec17 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK to the idea, didn't test the code... but looks sane :).\n
Nit: Can you use 4 space indentation for these?\n
Why remove this check? AFAIK we just display a total, if there was a fee.\n
Because I want to always show the total in all units, even if there is no fee\n
Let's not argue about the amount of indentation... \n
